title: Futura-Like and HelveticaCond-like fonts
content:
Good day, could you please help me with coupla fonts? this one is similar to futura but b and d have distinct features. Looks similar to [Standup](http://web.archive.org/web/20071211155353/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/standup/d-regular/) but again not exactly.

Second one having strange 1, different from other letters, otherwise looking like [Compacta](http://web.archive.org/web/20071211155353/http:/www.itcfonts.com/fonts/detail.htm?pid=242991) or HelveticaCond.

Sorry if i messed up with something, thank you.

author: pain

comments.content:
Hi Pain,  
they both are pre-digital, aren’t they? Where are the samples from?  
The flare-serif Futura looks nice!  
F

Unfortunately got them on paper looking exactly this crap :(  
Tried myfonts and identiFont but they didnt help.
